Articles.Content:
Landing mods, not just something that introduces new crewed lander parts but something for tings like lunokhod 1, or small mars probes like pathfinder. I.E. airbags, better landing legs, lander science,  lander engines, thing for getting payloads to non atmoshpheric places and getting those points!

Edited July 8, 2020 by Souptime

Hey!

There's a few that come to.mind; resuseability mod, station parts has some lovely base legs, Kks spaceX comes with falcon legs. Bumblebee drone might be worth looking at too! 

Hope some.of this helps. I just scroll the add-on releases tbh and see what's about - but I've seen most of what you're mentioning!
